etymology.description: Depicts a forked object or footprint
etymology.interpretation: The character 也(也) (yě, "also") is a pictogram that originally depicted a forked object or possibly a footprint. It does not represent a specific entity but evolved to be used phonemically, contributing its sound to form other characters.

examples.chinese: 我也喜欢这个电影(我也喜歡這個電影)。
他学习很努力(他學習很努力)，也参加运动会(也參加運動會)。
examples.pinyin: Tā xuéxí hěn nǔlì, yě cānjiā yùndònghuì.
examples.english: He studies hard, and also participates in the sports meet.
